title: Six players miss return to Arsenal training as Mikel Arteta given fresh headache | Football London
snippet: 11:00, 16 Dec 2025Updated 12:17, 16 Dec 2025 · View Image · Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta with Kai Havertz as the German fights to return from second major injury of the year(Image: Stuart MacFarlane/Arsenal FC via Getty Images) Arsenal’s players have returned to training at the Sobha Realty Training Centre after being granted a couple of days' recovery following the victory over Wolves.

title: Every word from Mikel Arteta's post-Wolves presser | Press conference | News | Arsenal.com
snippet: Share Arsenal Media 13 Dec 2025 · After enduring a rollercoaster of emotions in the final few minutes of our 2-1 win against Wolves, Mikel Arteta took his seat in the Emirates Stadium press conference room for post-match media duties.

title: Arsenal: Mikel Arteta hits out at 'passive' and 'unacceptable' defending as Gunners survive scare to beat Wolves | Football News | Sky Sports
snippet: Mikel Arteta branded elements of Arsenal's performance against Wolves as "unacceptable", slamming their "passive" and "horrible defensive habits" as they allowed their visitors to equalise late on.
